## IMarketplace.getActiveBids() method

Return all active bids for an auction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getActiveBids(listingId: BigNumberish): Promise<Offer[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listingId | BigNumberish | Id of the listing to get bids for. |
